item.title: Imperial College Yacht Club take to the seas in Greece
item.description: We flew into Preveza on the Ionian Coast excited for a week of sailing. EY Sailing, based in Lefkada, offered us an excellent deal for cruising the Ionian islands and were amazing hosts, showing us beautiful spots as we sailed between islands, enabling us to enjoy Greek hospitality to its fullest. â€¦
